= Components =

|| *Component Code* || *Component Name* || *Function* || *Comments* ||
|| *BGA.CN* || Caudate Nucleus || Excitation of correct action schemas and selection of appropriate sub-goals based on evaluation of action-outcomes || ||
|| *BGA.PU* || Putamen || Stimulus-response, or habit, learning || Regulate movements and influence various types of learning ||
|| *BGA.GPE* || Globus Pallidus External || Regulate and focus activity patterns in striatum, STN, GPi, and SNpr || ||
|| *BGA.GPI* || Globus Pallidus Internal || Output nuclei of basal ganglia to neocortex || Balance of direct and indirect paths ||
|| *BGA.SN.PC* || Substantia Nigra Pars Compacta || Fine motor control, temporal processing || supply striatum with dopamine, input to Basal Ganglia ||
|| *BGA.SN.PR* || Substantia Nigra Pars Reticulata || Convey final processed signals of basal ganglia to thalamus and superior colliculus || output from Basal Ganglia, inhibits BGA.SN.PC ||
|| *BGA.STN* || Subthalamic Nucleus || Perform action selection || dysfunction increases impulsivity in case of two equally rewarded stimuli ||
|| *BGA.NA* || Nucleus Accumbens || Activate motor functions under attention || ||
|| *BGA.TH.CM* || Centromedian Nucleus of Thalamus || Control of level of cortical activity || Lesions lead to persistent vegetative state ||
